oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Tribute To Chet Atkins - 2012-07-14
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Friends and Flame Keepers; Performances and stories honoring guitarist Chet Atkins featuring John Knowles; Megan Taylor; Muriel Anderson; Thom Bresh; Guy Van Duser; Ben Hall; Brooks Robertson; Joe Robinson from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on July 14, 2012. Companion to a Chet Atkins exhibit.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: John Knowles; Megan Taylor; Muriel Anderson; Thom Bresh; Guy Van Duser; Ben Hall; Brooks Robertson; Joe Robinson;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hosted by John Knowles; Includes selected audio excerpts; Performances include; The Entertainer (John Knowles); Windy And Warm (Guy Van Duser); He Ain't Heavy, He's My Brother (John Knowles); Nola (Muriel Anderson); View From Space (Muriel Anderson); Maybelle (Megan Taylor); Hello My Baby/Whispering/Has Anybody Seen My Gal? (Ben Hall); Do I Ever Cross Your Mind (Ben Hall and Megan Taylor); Royal Flush (Joe Robinson); Skyline (Joe Robinson); (Thom Bresh); Vermillion (Thom Bresh); Guts And Steel (Brooks Robinson and Thom Bresh); Happy Again (excerpt by John Knowles); Happy Again (excerpt by Thom Bresh); Happy Again (Brooks Robertson joined by John Knowles and Thom Bresh); Bresh);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Atkins, Chet; Knowles, John; Taylor, Megan; Hall, Ben; Bresh, Thom; Van Duser, Guy; Robertson, Brooks; Robinson, Joe; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
